name: showProgress
description: Opens the progress window with options `progress`.  See the Progress Object Schema for more information.

name: logMessage
description: Prints `message` to a determine progress modal's log.

name: progressMessage
description: Sets the progress window's progress message to `message`.

name: addProgress
description: Adds `num` to a determinate progress modal's progress bar.

name: progressTitle
description: Sets the title of a determinate progress modal to `title`.

name: allowClose
description: Allows a determinate progress modal to be closed by the user.

name: onProgressClosed
description: Executes `callback` when the progress window is closed.
